author: Andrew Sentance
title: Turmoil of the 1970s shows fixing the public finances will take decades not years
text: Economics Turmoil of the 1970s shows fixing the public finances will take decades not years Chancellor George Osborne is right to balance the books, but the bigger challenge is to overhaul the economy and tax system British Leyland strikers outside The Cowley Works In Oxford in the 1970s Photo: REX FEATURES By Andrew Sentance
